summary: Vinkar Pujang is a prestigious Grade A, mixed-use commercial building situated in Shanghai. It boasts a total of 22 storeys and was built around Q2 of 2023. This modern structure is known to offer an impressive collection of retail, office, and F&B units. The office units range in size from 1315 to 3926 sq. ft. and its total floor area is approximately 250,000 sq.m.
